premise: + Steve Harvey + Broderick Stephen `` Steve '' Harvey ( born January 17 , 1957 ) is an American comedian , television host , producer , radio personality , actor , and author . + Steve Harvey + He is the author of Act Like a Lady , Think Like a Man , which was published in March 2009 , and the book Straight Talk , No Chaser : How to Find and Keep a Man . + Steve Harvey + He hosts The Steve Harvey Morning Show , the Steve Harvey talk show , Family Feud and Little Big Shots . + Steve Harvey + He is a five-time Daytime Emmy Award winner , and a 14-time NAACP Image Award winner in various categories . + Television producer + A television producer is a person who oversees all aspects of video production on a television program .
